title: screaming a little?
body:
I don't know where else to put this but like. I've been waiting on my Rakan and Xayah icon for a little over two weeks now? ;w;'' 
I gifted Xayah to my boyfriend the 24th of April and it's the 10th of May and I'm just wondering if anyone else is having this problem or like am I the only one?? 

Send help yonder this way

replies.body: There's a lot of eligible players, so it's taken a bit to roll them out and we're pretty much done.  I looked into your case and was able to verify eligibility, so I've added it to your account.  Cheers!
Could you look at mine? Cause i did both things and havent received either icons. I already posted in help and support.
